Trip Outline
Rates mentioned may vary based on demand. Kindly contact us on +91 739-739-0005 before booking the package. You can modify the package with self-drive bikes/ cars by contacting our customer support. Tour itinerary will be shared based on your arrival/ departure timing & mode of transport. Goa is active 24 hours. Unlike other destinations, you can experience a whole new lifestyle at night. Avoid late night parties & casino if you have Dudhsagar/ Scuba Diving/ Hot Air Balloon/ Paragliding/Motoring booking the next day early morning.
Trip Instruction
Rates mentioned may vary based on demand. Kindly contact us on +91 739-739-0005 before booking the package Goa has no restrictions on dress code. You can wear your favourite dress of choice SCAM ALERT: Stay away from guides roaming on roads & gamblers on beach Child less than 3 years Free of Cost (Maximum 1 child per couple) Child 3 years to 9 years need to pay 40% of Adult (Maximum 1 child per couple) Age 10 years and above considered as Adult
Trip Includes
1 Room for up to 4 pax & 2 rooms for 5 – 7 paxc/n Standard AC Room with Swimming Pool Stay in Calangute/ near by Airport/ Railway Station 2 Way Transfers 1 Day North Goa Sightseeing 1 Day South Goa Sightseeing All Transfers & Sightseeing by AC Cab Parking, Toll & Driver Bata 24×7 Customer Support Multilingual Local Support All Applicable Taxes
